description:
Learn the basics to become an excellent dog trainer.

  1. Learn how your dog learns
  2. Learn How to Train Your Dog
  3. Learn about Clicker Training, which is the method we use at Treatpouch to teach your dog new behaviors.

This is a brief preview of â€œHow to Train Your Dog" course that introduces these basic concepts, and is intended to introduce you to our full training course, Polite Puppy.

Take this Dog Training 101 course and learn how to train your dog.
title: Training Your Dog 101
